net.iso2013.peapi.api.entity.modifier

Interface ModifiableEntity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FakeEntity

    public interface ModifiableEntity
    Since:
    2018-04-18
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all data contained in this modifiable entity.
      void clear(int index)
      Remove an object stored at the given index.
      boolean contains(int index)
      Check if this entity contains an entry for the given index
      com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedDataWatcher getDataWatcher()
      Get a WrappedDataWatcher containing the metadata contained by this modifiable entity object.
      Map<Integer,Object> getRawObjects()
      Get an index-keyed map of the metadata and the values contained by the metadata at each index.

      Get a list of the watchable objects that represents the metadata contained by this modifiable entity object.

    • Method Detail

      • getWatchableObjects

        List<com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedWatchableObject> getWatchableObjects()
        Get a list of the watchable objects that represents the metadata contained by this modifiable entity object.
        Returns:
        a list of all of the wrapped watchable objects with the metadata values, or null if the implementation does not support getting a list in its current state

      • getDataWatcher

        com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedDataWatcher getDataWatcher()
        Get a WrappedDataWatcher containing the metadata contained by this modifiable entity object.
        Returns:
        a wrapped data watcher containing the metadata, or null if the implementation does not support getting a watcher

      • getRawObjects

        Map<Integer,Object> getRawObjects()
        Get an index-keyed map of the metadata and the values contained by the metadata at each index.
        Returns:
        an map where the key is the index and the value is the metadata

      • read

        Object read(int index)
        Read an object at the given index
        Parameters:
        index - the index to read
        Returns:
        the object contained

      • write

        void write(int index,
           Object newValue,
           com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedDataWatcher.Serializer serializer)
        Write an object at the given index, using a provided serializer
        Parameters:
        index - the index to write at
        newValue - the object to write
        serializer - the serializer to use

      • clear

        void clear(int index)
        Remove an object stored at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to remove

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all data contained in this modifiable entity.

      • contains

        boolean contains(int index)
        Check if this entity contains an entry for the given index
        Parameters:
        index - the index to check for
        Returns:
        whether or not the index is present
